abstract: Drinking water is shipped to Glendive in eastern Montana after city's water supplies were contaminated by oil spill along the Yellowstone River.
lead_paragraph: Drinking water was being shipped to the eastern Montana city of Glendive on Monday after traces of a major oil spill along the Yellowstone River were detected in public water supplies.
snippet: Drinking water was being shipped to the eastern Montana city of Glendive on Monday after traces of a major oil spill along the Yellowstone River were detected in public water supplies.

headline.main: Montana: Water Warning Is Issued After Oil Spill
headline.print_headline: Montana: Water Warning Is Issued After Oil Spill
